Before that she was creating the artistic line of Marimekko, when working as the company's head designer. The Vuokko collection, completed twice a year, concists of classic and timeless creations. Vuokko stores can be found not only in Helsinki but also in Turku and Oulu.

item.title: Vuosaari Golf
item.description: Vuosaari Golf is a straightforward high quality golf course where it is easy to pop in for a game. The 18-hole course is located near the sea, so you can get there via the waters as well. Vuosaari Golf is a Scottish-style Links course that offers new challenges for an experienced player and good basis for training for a beginner.Vuosaari Golf is open to guest players and the season continues well into the autumn on the sandfilled course. Vuosaari Golf hosts courses in golf and the large range has room for everyone to practice on.
item.matko:location: Vuosaari

item.title: Vuosaari House
item.matko:location: In Vuosaari, metro connection from the city centre

item.title: Vuosaari Paddling Center, Natura Viva
item.description: The best way to explore the beautiful archipelago of Helsinki is by kayak. Kayaking is easy, fun and suitable for everybody. Vuosaari Paddling Center provide you with the best quality equipment and their professional staff will help you with any matters concerning their services.
item.matko:location: located in Vuosaari, Eastern Helsinki. Metro to Rastila
item.matko:open: Open 2015: May 1 - September 30. May: Mon-Fri 14-20, Sat-Sun 10-20. June, July, August: every day 10-22. September: Mon-Fri 14-20, Sat-Sun 10-20.
item.matko:services: Kayak rentals and a large variety of tours for individuals and groups. Also multi-day self-guided and guided trips camping on the islands. Next door Best Western Hotel Rantapuisto which offer accomodation, rooms for meetings and congresses, restaurant services and a nice sauna on the sea shore.

item.title: Wanha Satama (Old Harbour)
item.description: Wanha Satama is a prominent venue for events of all kinds: fairs and exhibitions, meetings and seminars, business events, galas, parties and banquets. The venue is composed of eight halls, in which the brick walls and arched windows create an atmosphere of days gone by, in sharp contrast to the modern technological solutions available. The halls can be used in different combinations. High-level restaurant services are the finishing touch to what you expect in terms of quality at your event - in good taste. Wanha Satama's personal service culture offers customers a safe and reliable environment to work in. Systematic quality work ensures the continuous development of operations and service range. The implementation keeps our promises and our maintenance of active customer relations ensures the success of customer goals. Our customers are top operators in domestic fields, international organisations and valued associations and societies. Each year, Wanha Satama hosts around 150 different events and occasions, seeing over 150,000 people a year. The operations have been awarded an ISO 9001 quality certificate. Wanha Satama is part of The Finnish Fair Corporation.
item.matko:location: City centre 5 min (0.7 km), airport 30 min (20 km)
item.matko:disabled: Full accessibility, toilet for wheelchair users, easy access for blind or partially sighted.
item.matko:restaurantinfo: Wanha Satama Restaurants tailors all the catering services of events individually to customer's requests. BRASSERIE: Lunch restaurant, open during the weekdays and on request for private functions. GARDEN: Lunch restaurant, open during events and on request. LOBBY: Open on request during events and private functions.
item.matko:exhibitioninfo: 8 halls, total exhibition space 4.000m2.
item.matko:additionalconferencerooms: Note: the halls have no fixed furnishings. The figures are thus the maximum areas and the halls are furnished as required.
item.matko:additionalinfo: Event planning & services, event coordination, AV and technical solutions, furniture solutions, exhibition planning & construction services, catering services, subcontractor services.

item.title: Wanhan Tanssikellari
item.description: Located in the center of Helsinki, Wanhan Tanssikellari offers food and ballroom dancing at the same time. On Mondays there is a DJ playing records. Tue-Sat the orchestras play music to dance to, from walzes to tango, except on Saturdays the music is more youthful with party- and pop/rockbands playing.
item.matko:open: Lunch Mon-Fri 10.30-14. Dance restaurant Tue 16-23, Wed 16-01, Thu 16-02, Fri-Sat 20-04. Grill Tue-Thu 16-22, Fri-Sat 16-24.

item.title: Warranttitalo
item.description: Massive Art Nouveau exterior of this former warehouse anticipated Art Deco´s monumentalism of the thirties and was designed by Lars Sonck (1913). Warranttitalo is located in Jugendstil district of Katajanokka and today serves as a Hotel Grand Marina.

item.title: Western Harbour
item.description: There are daily connections from the West Harbour to Tallinn both by passenger ferries and by high speed vessels during open sea. Over three million passengers pass through the West Terminal annually.

item.title: White Hall
item.description: Conference and event location in the middle of Helsinki's most famous Empire buildings, right by the Senate Square and the Helsinki Cathedral. The facilities in three floors consist of the entrance floor reception lobby and 30-seat cafeteria, second floor 120-seat restaurant/cafeteria and the third floor ballroom and lobby. The ballroom is suitable for dinners for 250 persons, cocktail parties for 700 and seminars for 450 persons.
item.matko:location: In the city centre, airport 19 km
item.matko:disabled: Access to the White Hall possible, easier entry Aleksanterinkatu 3. No access to the restaurant on the second floor or in the attic. Lift; essential for access, lift doors opens automatically, easy access for blind or partially sighted, lighting intensity 50-150 lux.
item.matko:exhibitioninfo: Foyer 130m2

item.title: William K
item.description: The beer restaurant William K offers a relaxed atmosphere perfect for an evening out with friends. There are also board games.

item.title: WOA
item.description: Work of Art WOA offers top quality designer shoes and bags for ladies and gentlemen from the following brands: Salvatore Ferragamo, Moreschi and Luciano Padovan (Italian), Piatonna and Beatrix Ong (British), Aki Choklat and Julia Lundsten/FINSK (Finnish)

item.title: Ylioppilasteatteri
item.description: Amateur Theatre
item.matko:open: Office: Mannerheimintie 3 B, tel. +358 (0)9 656 969, open mon-fri 12-17

item.title: Yrityslinna Ballroom
item.description: Yrityslinna ballroom offers great facilities for various private and official events like weddings, birthday parties, conferences, seminars and meetings. Besides the main ballroom, the facilities include a Cafeteria and two saunas.

item.title: Yrjönkatu Swimming Hall
item.description: Built in 1928, Yrjönkatu Swimming Hall is the oldest public swimming hall in Finland. The architecture of the building is historically and artistically noteworthy, representing a fine example of Classicism. You swim in Roman-style baths and can even do so naked! There are separate times for men and women. Voted the best City Break Experience in 2008.
item.matko:open: Different times for men and women, please check webpages. Closed during the summer season.
item.matko:admission: Different charges for different floors, please check webpages.
item.matko:disabled: Access for wheelchairs. Lift, disabled toilet.
item.matko:services: Café

item.title: Yume
item.description: Yume introduces a brand new world with unique flavors, exquisite dishes, extensive sake and tea list. Japanese restaurant Yume brings you the latest in Japanese cuisine. Choose just one of the Japanese favorites or share an unforgettable dining experience with your friends and combine a variety of authentic Japanese dishes of your choice.

item.title: Yökyöpeli Karaokebar
item.description: A small karaokebar close to the Kasarmintori.

item.title: Zio
item.description: For the widest selection of footwear that Helsinki has to offer, visit Zio. From trainers and sports styles to the most flattering heels for dinner dates and formal occasions, Zio's impressive range is second to none. Shoes for men and children are also available, alongside a range of day and evening bags to complement your final purchases. With three boutiques in Helsinki, you'll never have to venture too far for footwear. You can also order products online at www.zio.fi. Zio also in: Galleria Esplanad, 00100 Helsinki Fredrikinkatu 28, 00120 Helsinki

item.title: Zodiak - Center for New Dance
item.description: Zodiak - Center for New Dance is a unique performance, production and event center for artistic dance, as well as the regional center for dance in Helsinki. Zodiak presents the most interesting performers, performances and trends in contemporary dance.
item.matko:open: Office open weekdays 10-16. Closed during summer.
item.matko:admission: Adults 20€, children, students and pensioners 12€. Tickets also from Lippupalvelu.
item.matko:disabled: Restricted accessibility, toilet for wheelchair users, lift does not meet the spatial requirements of a wheelchair, parking for disabled in the inner yard of the building, easy access for blind or partially sighted, lighting intensity 50-150 lux
item.matko:groups: School and pensioner groups (min. 10 persons) 17/10€/person
item.matko:services: Café open half an hour before performance. Restaurang Hima & Sali in the Cable Factory.

item.title: Zucchini
item.description: Popular vegeterian lunch restaurant. Also gluten-free and vegan dishes.
